/contracts/Auction/ClockAuction.sol:Cloc.devdoc: {"methods":{"bid(uint256)":{"details":"Bids on an open auction, completing the auction and transferring  ownership of the NFT if enough Ether is supplied.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of token to bid on."}},"cancelAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an auction that hasn't been won yet.  Returns the NFT to original owner.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of token on auction"}},"cancelAuctionWhenPaused(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an auction when the contract is paused.  Only the owner may do this, and NFTs are returned to  the seller. This should only be used in emergencies.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of the NFT on auction to cancel."}},"createAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Creates and begins a new auction.","params":{"_duration":"- Length of time to move between starting  price and ending price (in seconds).","_endingPrice":"- Price of item (in wei) at end of auction.","_seller":"- Seller, if not the message sender","_startingPrice":"- Price of item (in wei) at beginning of auction.","_tokenId":"- ID of token to auction, sender must be owner."}},"getAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Returns auction info for an NFT on auction.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of NFT on auction."}},"getCurrentPrice(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the current price of an auction.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of the token price we are checking."}},"pause()":{"details":"called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"unpause()":{"details":"called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"Remove all Ether from the contract, which is the owner's cuts  as well as any Ether sent directly to the contract address.  Always transfers to the NFT contract, but can be called either by  the owner or the NFT contract."}},"title":"Clock auction for non-fungible tokens."}
/contracts/Auction/ClockAuction.sol:Cloc.userdoc: {"methods":{"cancelAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"This is a state-modifying function that can  be called while the contract is paused."}}}

/contracts/Auction/SaleClockAuction.sol:.devdoc: {"methods":{"bid(uint256)":{"details":"Updates lastSalePrice if seller is the nft contract Otherwise, works the same as default bid method."},"cancelAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an auction that hasn't been won yet.  Returns the NFT to original owner.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of token on auction"}},"cancelAuctionWhenPaused(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an auction when the contract is paused.  Only the owner may do this, and NFTs are returned to  the seller. This should only be used in emergencies.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of the NFT on auction to cancel."}},"createAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Creates and begins a new auction.","params":{"_duration":"- Length of auction (in seconds).","_endingPrice":"- Price of item (in wei) at end of auction.","_seller":"- Seller, if not the message sender","_startingPrice":"- Price of item (in wei) at beginning of auction.","_tokenId":"- ID of token to auction, sender must be owner."}},"getAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Returns auction info for an NFT on auction.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of NFT on auction."}},"getCurrentPrice(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the current price of an auction.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of the token price we are checking."}},"pause()":{"details":"called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"unpause()":{"details":"called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"Remove all Ether from the contract, which is the owner's cuts  as well as any Ether sent directly to the contract address.  Always transfers to the NFT contract, but can be called either by  the owner or the NFT contract."}},"title":"Clock auction modified for sale of kitties"}
/contracts/Auction/SaleClockAuction.sol:.userdoc: {"methods":{"cancelAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"This is a state-modifying function that can  be called while the contract is paused."}}}

/contracts/Auction/SiringClockAuction.so.devdoc: {"methods":{"bid(uint256)":{"details":"Places a bid for siring. Requires the sender is the KittyCore contract because all bid methods should be wrapped. Also returns the kitty to the seller rather than the winner."},"cancelAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an auction that hasn't been won yet.  Returns the NFT to original owner.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of token on auction"}},"cancelAuctionWhenPaused(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels an auction when the contract is paused.  Only the owner may do this, and NFTs are returned to  the seller. This should only be used in emergencies.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of the NFT on auction to cancel."}},"createAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Creates and begins a new auction. Since this function is wrapped, require sender to be KittyCore contract.","params":{"_duration":"- Length of auction (in seconds).","_endingPrice":"- Price of item (in wei) at end of auction.","_seller":"- Seller, if not the message sender","_startingPrice":"- Price of item (in wei) at beginning of auction.","_tokenId":"- ID of token to auction, sender must be owner."}},"getAuction(uint256)":{"details":"Returns auction info for an NFT on auction.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of NFT on auction."}},"getCurrentPrice(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the current price of an auction.","params":{"_tokenId":"- ID of the token price we are checking."}},"pause()":{"details":"called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"unpause()":{"details":"called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state"},"withdrawBalance()":{"details":"Remove all Ether from the contract, which is the owner's cuts  as well as any Ether sent directly to the contract address.  Always transfers to the NFT contract, but can be called either by  the owner or the NFT contract."}},"title":"Reverse auction modified for siring"}
/contracts/Auction/SiringClockAuction.so.userdoc: {"methods":{"cancelAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"This is a state-modifying function that can  be called while the contract is paused."}}}

/contracts/ERC721Draft.sol:ERC721.devdoc: {"author":"Dieter Shirley <dete@axiomzen.co> (https://github.com/dete)","methods":{},"title":"Interface for contracts conforming to ERC-721: Non-Fungible Tokens"}

/contracts/ExternalInterfaces/GeneScienc.devdoc: {"methods":{"isGeneScience()":{"details":"simply a boolean to indicate this is the contract we expect to be"},"mixGenes(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"given genes of kitten 1 & 2, return a genetic combination - may have a random factor","params":{"genes1":"genes of mom","genes2":"genes of sire"},"return":"the genes that are supposed to be passed down the child"}},"title":"defined the interface that will be referenced in main Kitty contract"}

/contracts/KittyAccessControl.sol:KittyA.devdoc: {"author":"Axiom Zen (https://www.axiomzen.co)","methods":{"pause()":{"details":"Called by any \"C-level\" role to pause the contract. Used only when  a bug or exploit is detected and we need to limit damage."},"setCEO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCEO":"The address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCFO":"The address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCOO":"The address of the new COO"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpauses the smart contract. Can only be called by the CEO, since  one reason we may pause the contract is when CFO or COO accounts are  compromised."}},"title":"A facet of KittyCore that manages special access privileges."}

/contracts/KittyAuction.sol:KittyAuction.devdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_to":"The address to be granted transfer approval. Pass address(0) to  clear all approvals.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty that can be transferred if this call succeeds."}},"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_addr":"The address that will be able to sire with your Kitty. Set to  address(0) to clear all siring approvals for this Kitty.","_sireId":"A Kitty that you own that _addr will now be able to sire with."}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance","params":{"_owner":"The owner address to check."}},"bidOnSiringAuction(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Completes a siring auction by bidding.  Immediately breeds the winning matron with the sire on auction.","params":{"_matronId":"- ID of the matron owned by the bidder.","_sireId":"- ID of the sire on auction."}},"breedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)","_sireId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)"}},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)","_sireId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)"}},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the proposed matron.","_sireId":"The ID of the proposed sire."}},"createSaleAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Put a kitty up for auction.  Does some ownership trickery to create auctions in one tx."},"createSiringAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Put a kitty up for auction to be sire.  Performs checks to ensure the kitty can be sired, then  delegates to reverse auction."},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"details":"Looks at a given Kitty and, if pregnant and if the gestation period has passed,  combines the genes of the two parents to create a new kitten. The new Kitty is assigned  to the current owner of the matron. Upon successful completion, both the matron and the  new kitten will be ready to breed again. Note that anyone can call this function (if they  are willing to pay the gas!), but the new kitten always goes to the mother's owner.","params":{"_matronId":"A Kitty ready to give birth."},"return":"The Kitty ID of the new kitten."},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"params":{"_kittyId":"reference the id of the kitten, any user can inquire about it"}},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance."},"pause()":{"details":"Called by any \"C-level\" role to pause the contract. Used only when  a bug or exploit is detected and we need to limit damage."},"rescueLostKitty(uint256,address)":{"details":"Transfers a kitty owned by this contract to the specified address.  Used to rescue lost kitties. (There is no \"proper\" flow where this contract  should be the owner of any Kitty. This function exists for us to reassign  the ownership of Kitties that users may have accidentally sent to our address.)","params":{"_kittyId":"- ID of kitty","_recipient":"- Address to send the cat to"}},"setAutoBirthFee(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the minimum payment required for calling giveBirthAuto(). Can only  be called by the COO address. (This fee is used to offset the gas cost incurred  by the autobirth daemon)."},"setCEO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCEO":"The address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCFO":"The address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCOO":"The address of the new COO"}},"setGeneScienceAddress(address)":{"details":"Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.","params":{"_address":"An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward."}},"setSaleAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the sale auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of sale contract."}},"setSiringAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the siring auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of siring contract."}},"tokensOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"This method MUST NEVER be called by smart contract code. It will almost  certainly blow past the block gas limit once there are a large number of  Kitties in existence. Exists only to allow off-chain queries of ownership.  Optional method for ERC-721.","params":{"_index":"The zero-based index of the cat within the owner's list of cats.  Must be less than balanceOf(_owner).","_owner":"The owner whose Kitties we are interested in."}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_to":"The address of the recipient, can be a user or contract.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty to transfer."}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_from":"The address that owns the Kitty to be transfered.","_to":"The address that should take ownership of the Kitty. Can be any address,  including the caller.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty to be transferred."}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpauses the smart contract. Can only be called by the CEO, since  one reason we may pause the contract is when CFO or COO accounts are  compromised."},"withdrawAuctionBalances()":{"details":"Transfers the balance of the sale auction contract to the KittyCore contract. We use two-step withdrawal to prevent two transfer calls in the auction bid function."}},"title":"Handles creating auctions for sale and siring of kitties.  This wrapper of ReverseAuction exists only so that users can create  auctions with only one transaction."}
/contracts/KittyAuction.sol:KittyAuction.userdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Grant another address the right to transfer a specific Kitty via  transferFrom(). This is the preferred flow for transfering NFTs to contracts."},"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Grants approval to another user to sire with one of your Kitties."},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Returns the number of Kitties owned by a specific address."},"breedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Breed a Kitty you own (as matron) with a sire that you own, or for which you  have previously been given Siring approval. Will either make your cat pregnant, or will  fail entirely."},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Works like breedWith(), but includes a pre-payment of the gas required to call  the giveBirth() function when gestation is over. This will allow our autobirth daemon  to call giveBirth() as soon as the gestation timer finishes. The required payment is given  by autoBirthFee()."},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Checks to see if two cats can breed together, including checks for  ownership and siring approvals. Does NOT check that both cats are ready for  breeding (i.e. breedWith could still fail until the cooldowns are finished).  TODO: Shouldn't this check pregnancy and cooldowns?!?"},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"notice":"Have a pregnant Kitty give birth!"},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks that a given kitten is able to breed (i.e. it is not pregnant or  in the middle of a siring cooldown)."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the address currently assigned ownership of a given Kitty."},"tokensOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the nth Kitty assigned to an address, with n specified by the  _index argument."},"totalSupply()":{"notice":"Returns the total number of Kitties currently in existence."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfers a Kitty to another address. If transferring to a smart  contract be VERY CAREFUL to ensure that it is aware of ERC-721 (or  CryptoKitties specifically) or your Kitty may be lost forever. Seriously."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer a Kitty owned by another address, for which the calling address  has previously been granted transfer approval by the owner."}}}

/contracts/KittyBase.sol:KittyBase.devdoc: {"author":"Axiom Zen (https://www.axiomzen.co)","methods":{"pause()":{"details":"Called by any \"C-level\" role to pause the contract. Used only when  a bug or exploit is detected and we need to limit damage."},"setCEO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCEO":"The address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCFO":"The address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCOO":"The address of the new COO"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpauses the smart contract. Can only be called by the CEO, since  one reason we may pause the contract is when CFO or COO accounts are  compromised."}},"title":"Base contract for CryptoKitties. Holds all common structs, events and base variables."}

Only callable by COO","params":{"_genes":"the encoded genes of the kitten to be created, any value is accepted","_owner":"the future owner of the created kittens. This method does nothing but keep track of the new contract and  emit a message indicating that the new address is set. It's up to clients of this  contract to update to the new contract address in that case. (This contract will  be paused indefinitely if such an upgrade takes place.)","params":{"_v2Address":"new address"}},"setSaleAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the sale auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of sale contract."}},"setSiringAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the siring auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of siring contract."}},"tokensOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"This method MUST NEVER be called by smart contract code. It will almost  certainly blow past the block gas limit once there are a large number of  Kitties in existence. Exists only to allow off-chain queries of ownership.  Optional method for ERC-721.","params":{"_index":"The zero-based index of the cat within the owner's list of cats.  Must be less than balanceOf(_owner).","_owner":"The owner whose Kitties we are interested in."}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_to":"The address of the recipient, can be a user or contract.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty to transfer."}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_from":"The address that owns the Kitty to be transfered.","_to":"The address that should take ownership of the Kitty. Can be any address,  including the caller.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty to be transferred."}},"unpause()":{"details":"Override unpause so it requires all external contract addresses  to be set before contract can be unpaused. Also, we can't have  newContractAddress set either, because then the contract was upgraded."},"withdrawAuctionBalances()":{"details":"Transfers the balance of the sale auction contract to the KittyCore contract. We use two-step withdrawal to prevent two transfer calls in the auction bid function."}},"title":"CryptoKitties: Collectible, breedable, and oh-so-adorable cats on the Ethereum blockchain."}
/contracts/KittyCore.sol:KittyCore.userdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Grant another address the right to transfer a specific Kitty via  transferFrom(). This is the preferred flow for transfering NFTs to contracts."},"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Grants approval to another user to sire with one of your Kitties."},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Returns the number of Kitties owned by a specific address."},"breedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Breed a Kitty you own (as matron) with a sire that you own, or for which you  have previously been given Siring approval. Will either make your cat pregnant, or will  fail entirely."},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Works like breedWith(), but includes a pre-payment of the gas required to call  the giveBirth() function when gestation is over. This will allow our autobirth daemon  to call giveBirth() as soon as the gestation timer finishes. The required payment is given  by autoBirthFee()."},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Checks to see if two cats can breed together, including checks for  ownership and siring approvals. Does NOT check that both cats are ready for  breeding (i.e. breedWith could still fail until the cooldowns are finished).  TODO: Shouldn't this check pregnancy and cooldowns?!?"},"getKitty(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns all the relevant information about a specific kitty."},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"notice":"Have a pregnant Kitty give birth!"},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks that a given kitten is able to breed (i.e. it is not pregnant or  in the middle of a siring cooldown)."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the address currently assigned ownership of a given Kitty."},"tokensOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the nth Kitty assigned to an address, with n specified by the  _index argument."},"totalSupply()":{"notice":"Returns the total number of Kitties currently in existence."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfers a Kitty to another address. If transferring to a smart  contract be VERY CAREFUL to ensure that it is aware of ERC-721 (or  CryptoKitties specifically) or your Kitty may be lost forever. Seriously."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer a Kitty owned by another address, for which the calling address  has previously been granted transfer approval by the owner."}}}

/contracts/KittyMinting.sol:KittyMinting.devdoc: {"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_to":"The address to be granted transfer approval. Pass address(0) to  clear all approvals.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty that can be transferred if this call succeeds."}},"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_addr":"The address that will be able to sire with your Kitty. Set to  address(0) to clear all siring approvals for this Kitty.","_sireId":"A Kitty that you own that _addr will now be able to sire with."}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance","params":{"_owner":"The owner address to check."}},"bidOnSiringAuction(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Completes a siring auction by bidding.  Immediately breeds the winning matron with the sire on auction.","params":{"_matronId":"- ID of the matron owned by the bidder.","_sireId":"- ID of the sire on auction."}},"breedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)","_sireId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)"}},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)","_sireId":"The ID of the Kitty acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)"}},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the proposed matron.","_sireId":"The ID of the proposed sire."}},"createGen0Auction(uint256)":{"details":"Creates a new gen0 kitty with the given genes and  creates an auction for it."},"createPromoKitty(uint256,address)":{"details":"we can create promo kittens, up to a limit. Only callable by COO","params":{"_genes":"the encoded genes of the kitten to be created, any value is accepted","_owner":"the future owner of the created kittens. Default to contract COO"}},"createSaleAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Put a kitty up for auction.  Does some ownership trickery to create auctions in one tx."},"createSiringAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Put a kitty up for auction to be sire.  Performs checks to ensure the kitty can be sired, then  delegates to reverse auction."},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"details":"Looks at a given Kitty and, if pregnant and if the gestation period has passed,  combines the genes of the two parents to create a new kitten. The new Kitty is assigned  to the current owner of the matron. Upon successful completion, both the matron and the  new kitten will be ready to breed again. Note that anyone can call this function (if they  are willing to pay the gas!), but the new kitten always goes to the mother's owner.","params":{"_matronId":"A Kitty ready to give birth."},"return":"The Kitty ID of the new kitten."},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"params":{"_kittyId":"reference the id of the kitten, any user can inquire about it"}},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance."},"pause()":{"details":"Called by any \"C-level\" role to pause the contract. Used only when  a bug or exploit is detected and we need to limit damage."},"rescueLostKitty(uint256,address)":{"details":"Transfers a kitty owned by this contract to the specified address.  Used to rescue lost kitties. (There is no \"proper\" flow where this contract  should be the owner of any Kitty. This function exists for us to reassign  the ownership of Kitties that users may have accidentally sent to our address.)","params":{"_kittyId":"- ID of kitty","_recipient":"- Address to send the cat to"}},"setAutoBirthFee(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the minimum payment required for calling giveBirthAuto(). Can only  be called by the COO address. (This fee is used to offset the gas cost incurred  by the autobirth daemon)."},"setCEO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CEO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCEO":"The address of the new CEO"}},"setCFO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the CFO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCFO":"The address of the new CFO"}},"setCOO(address)":{"details":"Assigns a new address to act as the COO. Only available to the current CEO.","params":{"_newCOO":"The address of the new COO"}},"setGeneScienceAddress(address)":{"details":"Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.","params":{"_address":"An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward."}},"setSaleAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the sale auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of sale contract."}},"setSiringAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the siring auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of siring contract."}},"tokensOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"This method MUST NEVER be called by smart contract code. It will almost  certainly blow past the block gas limit once there are a large number of  Kitties in existence. Exists only to allow off-chain queries of ownership.  Optional method for ERC-721.","params":{"_index":"The zero-based index of the cat within the owner's list of cats.  Must be less than balanceOf(_owner).","_owner":"The owner whose Kitties we are interested in."}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_to":"The address of the recipient, can be a user or contract.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty to transfer."}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Required for ERC-721 compliance.","params":{"_from":"The address that owns the Kitty to be transfered.","_to":"The address that should take ownership of the Kitty. Can be any address,  including the caller.","_tokenId":"The ID of the Kitty to be transferred."}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpauses the smart contract. Can only be called by the CEO, since  one reason we may pause the contract is when CFO or COO accounts are  compromised."},"withdrawAuctionBalances()":{"details":"Transfers the balance of the sale auction contract to the KittyCore contract. We use two-step withdrawal to prevent two transfer calls in the auction bid function."}},"title":"all functions related to creating kittens"}

/contracts/zeppelin-solidity/contracts/l.devdoc: {"methods":{"pause()":{"details":"called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state"},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}},"unpause()":{"details":"called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state"}},"title":"Pausable"}

/contracts/zeppelin-solidity/contracts/o.devdoc: {"methods":{"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}}},"title":"Ownable"}
